00232 
00233     int N = m.dim_;
00234     int i;
00235 
00236     if (ref_ )                  // is this structure just a pointer?
00237     {
00238         if (dim_ != m.dim_)     // check conformance,
00239         {
00240             cerr << "MV_VectorRef::operator=  non-conformant assignment.\n";
00241             exit(1);
00242         }
00243 
00244         // handle overlapping matrix references
00245         if ((m.p_ + m.dim_) >= p_)
00246         {
00247             // overlap case, copy backwards to avoid overwriting results
00248             for (i= N-1; i>=0; i--)
00249                 p_[i] = m.p_[i];
00250         }
00251         else
00252         {
00253             for (i=0; i<N; i++)
00254                 p_[i] = m.p_[i];
00255         }
00256                 
00257     }
00258     else
00259     {
00260         newsize(N);
00261 
00262         // no need to test for overlap, since this region is new
